meanings.definition: A soft, absorbent cloth used for cleaning or drying.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a few chammies in the kitchen to wipe spills.
meanings.sent2: She used a chammies to dry the dishes after washing them.
meanings.sent3: The chammies danced in the air as she shook them out to dry.
meanings.sent4: The chammies were like thirsty sponges, soaking up every drop of water.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow chammies were a cheerful addition to the cleaning supplies.

meanings.definition: Informal term for comfortable, casual clothing, typically made of cotton or flannel.
meanings.sent1: After work, he changed into his favorite chammies to relax.
meanings.sent2: She loves wearing her cozy chammies on lazy Sundays.
meanings.sent3: The cat snuggled up on the pile of chammies left on the couch.
meanings.sent4: Her chammies were like a warm hug after a long day at work.
meanings.sent5: The soft chammies felt like a cloud against her skin.
